mutants.code:
def distribute_gold(golds):
    g = golds[:]
    (turn, total) = (0, [0, 0])
    while g:
        total[turn % 2] -= g.pop(-(g[0] < g[-1]))
        turn += 1
    return total

def distribute_gold(golds):
    g = golds[:]
    (turn, total) = (0, [0, 0])
    while g:
        total[turn % 2] += g.pop(-(g[0] < g[-1]))
        turn -= 1
    return total
